3.1.13 Taṃjīvaṃtaṃsarīraṃsutta
Diṭṭhisaṃyutta
Sotāpattivagga
Taṃjīvaṃtaṃsarīraṃsutta
218.
961Sāvatthinidānaṃ. “Kismiṃ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṃ upādāya, kiṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati—  ‘taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīran’”ti? “Bhagavaṃmūlakā no, bhante, dhammā…pe…  niyato sambodhiparāyano”ti.
962Terasamaṃ.
